markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift Elusion](/Feats.aspx?ID=4985) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 177 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

**Trigger**
A foe ends its movement adjacent to you

</column>

---

Attempt an Acrobatics check against the foe’s Reflex DC. If you succeed, either Stride to a different space adjacent to the foe or move the foe to a different space adjacent to you.
name: Swift Elusion
